about_the_game:
Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping multiplayer adventure in Only Up, the ultimate parkour challenge that will push your skills to the limit! Race against friends and players from around the world as you navigate through intricate obstacles, scaling towering heights to claim victory. There's no looking back once you start; one misstep, and you'll be freefalling all the way down. Are you ready to prove your parkour prowess and rise to the top?

In a world where gravity-defying parkour has become an exhilarating sport, a new competition emerges called Only Up. Brave participants gather from far and wide, eager to conquer the most challenging and vertigo-inducing obstacle courses ever devised. As an aspiring parkour prodigy, you've set your sights on becoming the ultimate champion. The goal is simple: race to the highest point, and only the fastest, most skilled athlete will claim victory.

Only Up is an intense multiplayer parkour game where precision and speed are paramount. Leap and climb your way through a variety of obstacles, each presenting unique challenges and surprises. The slightest miscalculation can spell disaster, sending you tumbling down to the starting line.

Timing and precision are essential as you navigate through moving platforms, rotating gears, and other daunting obstacles. The courses are designed to keep you on your toes, ensuring that every race is an intense test of your parkour prowess.

Features:
- Multiplayer Parkour Mayhem: Compete against friends and players worldwide in thrilling parkour races.
- Vertigo-Inducing Obstacle Courses: Scale towering heights and conquer intricate challenges.
- Precision and Timing: Master the art of parkour to stay ahead of the competition.
- Thrilling Race to the Top: Experience the rush of soaring to great heights and overcoming all odds.

Do you have what it takes to ascend above the competition and become the parkour legend in Only Up? The challenges are daunting, but the rewards are monumental. Prove your mettle, conquer the course, and etch your name among the greatest parkour champions of all time!

ext_user_account_notice: Microsoft Playfab (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: Only Up: With Friends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Only Up: With Friends is a multiplayer parkour game where speed is essential. Race against your friends to the top by climbing a variety of dynamic obstacles. One mistake and its back to the start...
